divs: Sighting DetailsOn May 28, 2011, at 9:30 p.m. I went outside to turn off the water hose that I had soaking my magnolia tree. I notice 5 very bright yellow circles with a smaller red circle of lights on the outside floating over my head. They were traveling South to North very slow and there was no sound. Soon 3 or 4 more circles came over, then several more, etc. I watched for 20 mins. and counted 15 total. They were not in a formation and were not bouncing all over the sky. They seem to stay on the South to North path. I called the Lone Star Airport around 10 p.m. to report what I had seen and asked if they had seen anything in the sky, but no one there had seen anything. Since then I've learned that a neighbor had seen the same thing around the same time but had counted more circles. They must have started watching before I came outside.
Summary: For 20 minutes I watched 15 yellow circles fly over my house
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Conroe
There were no other sightings in Conroe on or around May 28th 2011
